title: Do you think that you can develop all aspects of yourself, or do you believe that 'one cannot have everything'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tricky question. You can develop quite a few aspects about yourself, but there is a limit to your ability to have all aspects completely molded, simply because most will change through time to what you don't like from your every day life. Unless you're a psychological genius and you've figured out how to create a super multiple personality complex, I do not believe it is possible for all aspects to remain the same to please you.
Certainly , you can improve all aspects of yourself. You can be more social, you can have better health, more wealth, be more happy but it takes understanding and awareness.
